bug.author: alex-zwingli
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
The "benchmark notebook" link on the Recommenders README is broken (aka. goes to GitHub 404 Star Wars page). <denchmark-h:h3>In which platform does it happen?</denchmark-h>
Online
<denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the issue?</denchmark-h>
Click on "benchmark notebook" link under Algorithms > Preliminary Comparison. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
Think link should go to the appropriate notebook.

comments.comment: Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/alex-zwingli>@alex-zwingli</denchmark-link> ! Put in a patch now, we'll roll it through staging and then to master.
